title: LF Jungler, Mid & Top laner.
body:
- Wanting Diamond 5+
 we have currently a p2 team planning on making it to challenger, we want proactive players that can play the times we usually set. 

Add 'Madcowgirl' or 'Yugi Mutou' and send us this format filled out

S4/S5 Rank:
Most played champs:
Role: 
Age:
